Ni Hao Kai-Lan: Princess Kai-Lan
U, Karen Chau  (Director),     Chau, Karen  (Director),     Peters, Jade-Lianna  (Actor)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Movies & TV Holiday Wishlist
['Kai-lan, Rintoo, Tolee and Hoho are playing in the backyard when they get a visit from their superhero friend, the Monkey King, who really needs their help. Will Kai-lan and her friends go on an adventure with the Monkey King and see what they can do? Of course they will! The Monkey King gives them robes to wear that give them special powers to float, jump, and spin in the air! They’ll have to use their special powers – and the viewer’s help – to leap over bamboo forests, travel past a moat of giant bubbles, and find their way into the majestic palaces.']
{'Genre': "Children's", 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Peters, Jade-Lianna, U, Karen Chau, Chau, Karen', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'U, Karen Chau, Chau, Karen', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Actors': 'Peters, Jade-Lianna', 'Studio': 'NIC'}
my 4 yr old grandaughter loves these movies.I couldnt find any of them in the stores so I was very glad to be able to find them on the amazon. I like the fact that each one of these kinds of movies teaches  about different cultures and lifestyles in a way that is interesting for little kids.
great story line
Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: Kai-Lan's Great Trip to China
Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Animation
["Join Kai-Lan and her friends Rintoo, Tolee and Ho Ho on their exciting trip to China! In the double-length, feature episode Kai-lan and her friends travel to visit her aunt and a baby panda in China, and are amazed by all the things they see along the way! The DVD includes 2 additional episodes, plus a Kai-Lan Goes to China game. Special Features: Full Frame Audio: Dolby Digital, Stereo - English Features: 1. Music Video: We're Going to China Music Video Runtime: 96 Minutes."]

Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: Super Special Days
Clem Cheung  (Actor),     Khamani Griffin  (Actor),     Allan Jacobsen  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
['Product Description', 'Super Special Days!', 'is the DVD launch of', 'Ni Hao, Kai-lan', '.', 'Ni Hao Kai-lan', 'is an all-new animated series from Nickelodeon designed to open the eyes, ears and hearts of children to a fantastic new way to understand their social, emotional and physical world. Kai-lan and her animal friends encounter and learn to overcome daily obstacles that will help kids at home make sense of the world around them. Aspects of Chinese-American family, food and culture, as well as basic Mandarin Chinese phrases are woven throughout the episodes.', 'Amazon.com', 'A sort of', 'Dora the Explorer', 'that features Mandarin Chinese instead of Spanish,', 'Ni hao, Kai-lan', "is an entertaining Nick Jr. animated program for preschoolers that positively portrays biculturalism, helps build problem solving skills, and introduces basic Chinese words. Kai-lan is a creative, compassionate young girl who has a very close relationship with her Grandfather (YeYe) and loves to play and try new things with her many animal friends including Tolee the koala, Rintoo the tiger, and Hoho the monkey. Like all young children, Kai-lan and her friends play and explore and minor conflicts and emotional outbursts inevitably arise. Kai-lan has a way of stepping back and reviewing the situation to reveal the underlying problem, whether it's hurt feelings, frustration, or downright anger. With a little help from her grandfather and his calming techniques, she always finds a way to support her friends and make everyone feel better. Along the way, viewers learn some basic Chinese words and get a sense of the importance Chinese culture places on things like intergenerational families, calmness, and looking at things from another's perspective. (Ages 3 to 7)", '--Tami Horiuchi']

good for kids to watch, shows them that life is always good when you have family and friends around you
every day is special when you have friends
Top Gun (Full Screen Collector's Edition)
Tom Cruise  (Actor),     Kelly McGillis  (Actor),     Tony Scott  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Action & Adventure
['In TOP GUN, Tom Cruise stars as Maverick, a talented training pilot in an elite U.S. school for fighter pilots. When he stumbles upon some MiG\'s over the Persian Gulf, and his wingman panics, Maverick cleverly talks him through the situation to safety. Consequently, he is moved up in rank and sent to the Top Gun Naval Flying School. There he has several conflicts with other students while trying to live up to his deceased father\'s reputation. Unable to cope with the death of his best friend, and fellow pilot, Goose, Maverick contemplates dropping out, but follows through with his dream and ultimately becomes one of the "best of the best."']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest**: The user is enthusiastic about action and adventure films, particularly those centered on aviation themes. They also display a growing fascination with family-friendly content that educates children about cultural diversity. Recent activities indicate a preference for animated films that engage younger audiences, alongside classic military movies emphasizing personal growth and resilience.

- **Shopping Behavior**: The user values cost-effectiveness, especially in acquiring educational and entertaining children’s media. They are inclined to seek out iconic action films for their collection while also appreciating popular animated features that appeal to their granddaughter.

- **Content Format Preference**: A strong inclination towards physical media persists, with a preference for DVDs that foster shared family experiences. Recent purchases highlight a blend of animated content and educational films, enriching family learning environments.

- **Quality Expectations**: The user maintains high standards for product quality and shipping, typically providing positive feedback for experiences that meet or exceed expectations, particularly regarding entertainment and educational value.

- **Entertainment Value**: They cherish narratives that resonate across generations, focusing on themes of ambition, responsibility, and cultural storytelling. Their engagement with animated films indicates an evolving interest in accessible content for children.

- **Rating Behavior**: The user tends to rate highly, particularly valuing the quality of content and physical condition of media, demonstrating an affinity for products that effectively cater to family interests.

This summary reflects the user’s commitment to blending adventure with education while enhancing family connections through diverse cinematic experiences.
